full_text:
Page 401
To: "Charisma Edge (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)" <(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov>
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@usdoj.gov>
Subject: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054
Sent: Tue, 5 Nov 2019 23:44:58 +0000

Charisma
Our Prisoner Operations Division in Headquarters is requesting any reports prepared in the investigation surrounding the death of EPSTEIN. They are requesting the information by tomorrow 11/6/2019- I apologize for the short notice, but can you please provide me with the reports prepared by BOP.

Thank you
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Deputy United States Marshal
Southern District of New York
646-942-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

DOJ-OGR-00024898
